channel.title: Quota on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Quota on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Quota and deployment troubleshooting tools for Azure Functions Flex Consumption
item.description:
Azure Functions Flex Consumption now generally includes platform-integrated tools to troubleshoot quota availability and deployment behavior.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In development] Public Preview: User and group quota reports in Azure NetApp Files
item.description:
Azure NetApp Files is releasing a public preview of user and group quota reports that give visibility into quota limits and usage for NFS, SMB, and dual-protocol volumes to help organizations monitor and manage capacity.

  • Source: Azure Updates
